title: A New game Mode Idea
body:
Hey Riot,
What about a game mode where in the pre-game screen teams vote for one complete item each that can be bought in the shop while in the game. Meaning a a total of only two items.
For example my team has the majority vote for an infinity edge and the other teams vote went towards a Black Cleaver so only those two items (and their sub items) could be purchased throughout the entire game.

What do you guys think?

replies.body:
So you mean only those two items could be bought - everyone on your team would have 6x {{item:3031}} ?

Maybe instead have a pool of items - ban certain items like you do champions in ranked games (maybe 2?), then take a couple of items that are *exclusive* for each team to really mix it up. You might need a bit more in it for it to be a new mode though.

The games will just hit a stalemate because no one can ramp up to fulfil their late or mid game roles (the support will probably deal as much damage as an adc if both items picked were strictly tanky)
